title: Bickham-ish Puzzling Script.... Help Please... Is this a combination of faces?
content:
I think I’ve been through every possibility on myfonts. Can anyone help me identify this font?

Thanks in advance for any help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929160956im_/http:/typophile.com/files/401f419bf2fc9401bfeda0ce26a4648d_4580.145475.jpeg.jpg)

 [‹ 5 IDs that i came across this week](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929160956/http:/typophile.com/node/49936 "Go to previous forum topic") [Another easy one ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929160956/http:/typophile.com/node/49949 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ashesinthefalls

comments.content:
I can’t find anything with a ’G’ that has a loop in the descender, an ’I’ with a loop, and a loopless ’l’. The closest I got was [Palace Script.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929160956/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=palace+script&x=0&y=0&sample_text=Flavors%20Italian%20Grille)

- Lex
